name: lil-sisa
title: Emcee: Lil Sisa | FlipTop Battle League
description: Don’t be deceived by her girl-next-door look. On the battle stage, Lil Sisa can dismantle you with her confident delivery and brilliant mixture of bars and jokes. She debuted at the Sabong Sumulong event, scoring a unanimous decision victory against fellow femcee Hearty. At Ahon 7, Lil Sisa proved that she’s as good as the boys by defeating Shernan.
